title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Beauty is said to be in the eyes of the beholder, but only if youre paying attention. Perhaps youre so focused on whats unsightly and distressing around you that you cant see whats magnificent. Lovely Venus is under cosmic stress in your 1st House of Self, motivating you to heal your relationship with your environment and whoever is discordant in it. Simply sharing a piece of chocolate or hanging an arresting photo can tame tense, wild energy thats roaming too much in your orbit. Sufi poet Rumi wrote, When you go to a garden, do you look at thorns or flowers? Spend more time with the roses and jasmine. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
